entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Gjoa Haven
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 1:33 PM MST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -36.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Gjoa Haven Airport 1:00 PM MST Sunday 05 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -36.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.6 kPa falling
Visibility: 4.8 km
Humidity: 64 %
Wind Chill: -51
Dewpoint: -41.0°C
Wind: SW 18 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 43.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming partly cloudy this evening. Wind southwest 30 km/h. Low minus 43. Wind chill minus 52 this evening and minus 60 overnight. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MST Sunday 05 February 2023
